item.title: Trump administration live updates: Judge blocks Trump's military transgender ban
item.description: A federal judge has blocked the Trump administration from enforcing a ban on transgender service members.

item.title: Israeli forces resume ground operations in Gaza, IDF says
item.description: Israeli forces have resumed "focused ground operations" in the "center of the Gaza Strip," over the past 24 hours, according to the Israel Defense For...

item.title: Trump speaks with Ukraine's Zelenskyy after Putin rebuffs 30-day ceasefire plan
item.description: President Donald Trump spoke with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy on Wednesday as talks continue to try to end the Russia-Ukraine war.

item.title: WATCH: March Madness underway with ‘First Four’ games

item.title: WATCH: Dolphins greet NASA astronauts after splash down
item.description: A pod of dolphins circled the NASA astronauts' capsule after it successfully splashed down off the coast of Florida.
